phrases: Looks like Kakarrot has decided to lay low.
F- Father is not a coward!
What is become of you, Goku!?
At this point, it looks like we will have to fight them with just the three of us.
Let us go with that plan.
First, I draw his attention as much as I can.
I will find an opening, and grab his tail, the Saiyans' weakness.
Once his power fails, and he cannot move...
What are you all mumbling about?
It will not do any good.
What can you guys do against me?
We will show you what we can do, right now!
He is started charging me all of a sudden!
Whoa, do not you die, now.
We still have to have you tell us about the Dragon Balls.
Did you think we would leave our weak spot untrained forever?
The best that this planet had to offer,
and this is what happens to him after one blow.
Now then, while he has gone beddy-bye,
I think I will toy around with the little squirts.
I will start with Kakarrot's son.
Hey, you have inherited the blood of a true Saiyan.
You will be able to amuse me for a little while, right?
You know, your old man is pretty cold, huh?
Letting his own son die like this...
Dammit, what is going on here!?
The TV is not showing anything!
Come on, come on, come on!
I am sure that things are not going so smoothly
that they can provide us with a TV broadcast.
Y- you do not think that everyone has been killed already, do you?
Do not you say anything dire like that again!
C- Chichi, what are you doing, gussied up like that?
I am going to rescue Gohan!
If you go now, you are going to be killed!
I am going to die together with Gohan!
You are going to get killed!
-I am going to go rescue Gohan- chan!
l'm sure... l'm sure you are going to save the earth.
Hey now, do not you snuff it just yet!
Ho, at least his moves are pretty good.
Let me show you something I have been saving.
Cannot he tell what kind of technique that is!?
How dare you wound my face!
Looks like you are having a hard time with them, Nappa!
Do not you... do not you look down on Earth, Saiyan!
I was holding back against you,
since we cannot kill you because of the Dragon Balls.
But do not get too full of yourself!
You are the one who is too full of himself!
T- there is an incredible Ki coming this way from far off!
A- an amazing, yet familiar Ki!
You guys are all just spouting nonsense!
I knew he was sure to come!
Damn that bastard, making us wait for him!
These guys have the unusual ability to sense someone is presence.
two even more enormous Ki, and one small Ki...
Is what these guys are saying true?
Is Kakarrot really headed this way?
I do not know whether it is Kakarrot or not,
but someone will be here in about four minutes.
Someone with a battle power of 5000.
lt's definitely a reading that makes it unthinkable
that this is the same Kakarrot as before.
What is more, these guys are able to alter their readings.
That means it is at least 5000.
It must be some kind of mistake!
It is unusual to see this guy panicked.
If all four of them team up, it could be a problem for us!
It will also serve as a warning to Kakarrot!
But what about the Dragon Balls?
If we go to Planet Namek, the home world of that Namekian,
I am sure that there will be Dragon Balls that are even more powerful.
I thought they were just worthless stories,
but if Kakarrot really has come back to life,
then those legends are true after all.
But Kakarrot being 5000 has to be a mechanical malfunction.
It does not change the fact that I get to kill them all.
I will stop him one way or another until Father gets here!
After all, if you die, Piccolo- san, then Kami- sama dies too,
There is no way you can stop him by yourself!
I- if this keeps up, there will not be any going back...
Do not make me laugh, you brat!
Piccolo leaps in to rescue Gohan from his pinch.
